result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Ignition Interlock Device Tampering/Failure to Install/Violate Court Order

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Richard Donald Carlson

records.addlTxt: 10:09 AM Defendant Richard Donald Carlson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jon Padgham appeared by video for Richard Donald Carlson. Attorney Seifert appears for the State. Carlson and Padgham have complaint, waives reading of it, wants to waive PH and move to ARGN. Carlson agrees. Court does verbal waiver of right to PH, finds he is freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his right to PH, finds probable cause. With the understanding that the State will file an Information that mirrors the complaint within 48 hours, do parties want to proceed to ARGN. Parties will waive reading of the Information that is to be filed within 48 hours, enters NG pleas. Court accepts plea, continues bond at this point, set for JT.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
10:07 AM Defendant Richard Donald Carlson appeared by video from FOSO.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for the State of Wisconsin. State - here for a bail bond hearing. Court reviews file and report to see who set the original bond at $10,000.00 cash. Court asks defendant if he contacts an attorney. Carlson states he was informed that he was going to get paperwork for a court appointed attorney as he did not qualify for SPD. Court reviews file, according to the minutes - clerk sent that form to the jail. Court will continue bond at this point, ask jail for form and if not there, Clerk will send over a new one, fill out completely, sets for another AIA on 9/21/22 at 9:15 AM, will allow the defendant to make an argument for a bond reduction. Carlson makes argument, starting making statements about the case and Court stopped him from that and then allows to continue making a bond reduction argument. State - bond - objects to any reduction in bond for stated reasons. Court continues bond at this point, contact SPD today and keep contacting them until you get a hold of them.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 21, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Request to the judge requesting to be put in the drug court program.
Bail/bond hearing on September 7, 2022 at 09:15 am.

10:32 AM Defendant Richard Donald Carlson appeared by video, in custody from FC jail.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has  not received a copy of the criminal complaint. A copy will be provided to him at the jail. Court reads charges and penalties. Defendant understands. Court questions if they have contacted an attorney. Defendant has contacted SPD, indicates he makes to much money, unable to retain a private attorney. Court will have petition for appointment of attorney paperwork sent over to the jail for him to complete and return to the court. State no objection to reduction in bond, questions what Carlson might be able to post. Carlson indicates can possibly post $2500. State asks for $5,000 cash bond. Court questions Carlson. State interrupts court and now indicates he would like $10,000 cash bond to remain based on three open OWI cases. Court questions state. Court will continue bond at this point.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 14, 2022 at 09:45 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Richard Donald Carlson
Current: 2414 Elvoy Lane, Alvin, WI   (Effective: 08-30-2022)
Prior: 3816 Kentuck Lake Road, Phelps, WI 54554
